INSERT INTO TEST_CASES (PRIMARY_OWNER_ID, SECONDARY_OWNER_ID, TEST_SUITE_ID, TEST_CLASS, TEST_METHOD,
STATUS,
PROJECT_ID,
INFO) VALUES ( #{primaryOwner.id}, #{secondaryOwner.id}, #{testSuiteId}, #{testClass}, #{testMethod},
#{status},
#{project.id},
#{info} )
mapper.sql:
SELECT TC.ID AS TEST_CASE_ID, TC.PRIMARY_OWNER_ID AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_ID, TC.SECONDARY_OWNER_ID AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_ID, TC.TEST_SUITE_ID AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_ID, TC.TEST_CLASS AS TEST_CASE_TEST_CLASS, TC.TEST_METHOD AS TEST_CASE_TEST_METHOD, TC.INFO AS TEST_CASE_INFO, TC.STATUS AS TEST_CASE_STATUS, TC.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_MODIFIED_AT, TC.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_CREATED_AT,
P.ID AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_ID, P.NAME AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_NAME, P.DESCRIPTION AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION, P.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_MODIFIED_AT, P.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_CREATED_AT FROM TEST_CASES TC LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P ON TC.PROJECT_ID = P.ID

SELECT TC.ID AS TEST_CASE_ID, TC.PRIMARY_OWNER_ID AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_ID, TC.SECONDARY_OWNER_ID AS TEST_SECONDARY_OWNER_ID, TC.TEST_SUITE_ID AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_ID, TC.TEST_CLASS AS TEST_CASE_TEST_CLASS, TC.TEST_METHOD AS TEST_CASE_TEST_METHOD, TC.INFO AS TEST_CASE_INFO, TCHV.STABILITY AS TEST_CASE_STABILITY, TC.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_MODIFIED_AT, TC.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_CREATED_AT, TC.STATUS AS TEST_CASE_STATUS,
PU.ID AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_ID, PU.USERNAME AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_USERNAME, PU.FIRST_NAME AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_FIRST_NAME, PU.LAST_NAME AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_LAST_NAME, PU.EMAIL AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_EMAIL, PU.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_MODIFIED_AT, PU.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PRIMARY_OWNER_CREATED_AT,
SU.ID AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_ID, SU.USERNAME AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_USERNAME, SU.FIRST_NAME AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_FIRST_NAME, SU.LAST_NAME AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_LAST_NAME, SU.EMAIL AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_EMAIL, SU.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_MODIFIED_AT, SU.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_SECONDARY_OWNER_CREATED_AT,
TS.ID AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_ID, TS.USER_ID AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_USER_ID, TS.NAME AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_NAME, TS.FILE_NAME AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_FILE_NAME, TS.DESCRIPTION AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_DESCRIPTION, TS.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_MODIFIED_AT, TS.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_TEST_SUITE_CREATED_AT,
P.ID AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_ID, P.NAME AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_NAME, P.DESCRIPTION AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION, P.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_MODIFIED_AT, P.CREATED_AT AS TEST_CASE_PROJECT_CREATED_AT FROM TEST_CASES TC LEFT JOIN USERS PU ON PU.ID = TC.PRIMARY_OWNER_ID LEFT JOIN USERS SU ON SU.ID = TC.SECONDARY_OWNER_ID LEFT JOIN TEST_SUITES TS ON TS.ID = TC.TEST_SUITE_ID LEFT JOIN PROJECTS P ON TC.PROJECT_ID = P.ID LEFT JOIN TEST_CASE_HEALTH_VIEW TCHV ON TC.ID = TCHV.TEST_CASE_ID
mapper.select: WHERE TC.PRIMARY_OWNER_ID = #{userId} AND TC.TEST_CLASS = #{testClass} AND TC.TEST_METHOD = #{testMethod} AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEST_CASES TC LEFT JOIN USERS PU ON PU.ID = TC.PRIMARY_OWNER_ID LEFT JOIN TEST_SUITES TS ON TS.ID = TC.TEST_SUITE_ID LEFT JOIN TEST_CASE_HEALTH_VIEW TCHV ON TC.ID = TCHV.TEST_CASE_ID
AND TC.ID = #{id}
AND LOWER(TC.TEST_CLASS) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{testClass}, '%'))
AND LOWER(TC.TEST_METHOD) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{testMethod}, '%'))
AND LOWER(TS.NAME) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{testSuiteName}, '%'))
AND LOWER(TS.FILE_NAME) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{testSuiteFile}, '%'))
AND LOWER(PU.USERNAME) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
AND TC.CREATED_AT::date = #{date}::date
AND TC.CREATED_AT::date <= #{toDate}::date AND TC.CREATED_AT::date >= #{fromDate}::date
TC.PROJECT_ID = #{project.id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TEST_CASES
PRIMARY_OWNER_ID = #{primaryOwner.id},
SECONDARY_OWNER_ID = #{secondaryOwner.id},
TEST_SUITE_ID = #{testSuiteId},
TEST_CLASS = #{testClass},
TEST_METHOD = #{testMethod},
INFO = #{info},
PROJECT_ID = #{project.id},
STATUS = #{status}
WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE TEST_CASES SET PROJECT_ID = #{toProjectId} WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{fromProjectId}
